lead_paragraph: The latest transfer from the military prison came at a time of heightened scrutiny after a former prisoner there disappeared after being resettled in Uruguay.

headline.print_headline: A Yemeni Guantánamo Bay Prisoner Is Transferred to Italy After 14 Years
headline.main: Yemeni Guantánamo Prisoner Is Transferred to Italy After 14 Years

snippet: The latest transfer from the military prison came at a time of heightened scrutiny after a former prisoner there disappeared after being resettled in Uruguay....
abstract: Guantanamo detainee Fayiz Ahmad Yahia Suleiman, Yememi who has been held in Cuba for 14 and a half years, is transferred to Italy; Obama administration says it hopes to relocate remaining detainees on transfer list, of which there are no more than 29, over next few months.
